#summary How to customixze nginx on www instance

= Introduction =

www is running stock nginx .deb package.
You will need to use a source .deb package if you wish to add any extra nginx modules.

= Details =

Here's how to add an extra module into a .deb package:

{{{
apt-get source nginx

apt-get install build-essential autotools-dev

cd nginx-0.5.33/

vim debian/rules
}}}

find './configure' rules and add --add-module=<path to module sources> at the end.

{{{
dpkg-buildpackage
}}}
This will create a .deb file in upper-level directory, which you can install with `dpkg -i`
